thread.title: Tom Jones Defends Himself After Making 'Homosexual' Comments
thread.title_full: Tom Jones Defends Himself After Making 'Homosexual' Comments

title: Tom Jones Defends Himself After Making 'Homosexual' Comments
text: Tom Jones Defends Himself After Making 'Homosexual' Comments Friday, 23 October 2015 (7 minutes ago) Responding to the criticisms about his view of homosexuals in music industry, the 'Delilah' singer said his words were taken out of context. The singer said he was "paranoid" of homosexuals earlier in his career. Digital Spy 19 hours ago - Celebrities First accused of sexism after comments about his wife Linda, Sir Tom Jones has now dug himself into another hole, admitting he used to be prejudiced against gays... MailOnline 2 days ago - Front Page You Might Like
